contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox album | <!-- See Wikipedia:WikiProject_Albums --> | Name = Ani DiFranco | Type = studio | Artist = [[Ani DiFranco]] | Cover = Ani difranco - ani difranco.jpg | Released = November 1, 1990 | Recorded = September 1990 | Genre = [[Indie rock]], [[folk music|folk]] | Length = 46:12 | Label = [[Righteous Babe Records|Righteous Babe]] | Producer = Dale Anderson, Ani DiFranco | This album = '''''Ani DiFranco'''''<br />(1990) | Next album = ''[[Not So Soft]]''<br />(1991) }} {{Album ratings |rev1 = [[Allmusic]] |rev1score = {{Rating|4|5}}<ref>[{{Allmusic|class=album|id=r130976/review|pure_url=yes}} Allmusic review]</ref> |rev2 = ''[[The Rolling Stone Album Guide]]'' |rev2score = {{Rating|3.5|5}}<ref>{{Cite book| last = Brackett | first = Nathan | authorlink = | coauthors = Christian Hoard | title = The Rolling Stone Album Guide | publisher = Simon and Schuster | year = 2004 | location = New York City, New York | pages = 236-7 | isbn = 0-7432-0169-8 | url = http://books.google.com/books?id=t9eocwUfoSoC&pg=PA236&lpg=PA236&dq=rolling+stone+ani+difranco+album+guide&source=bl&ots=BiOipg2TW1&sig=PDFYIjGTbe7bw4oUkgAmqMtamJk&hl=en&sa=X&ei=yrXLUcGoGoW34APV04H4Dw&ved=0CFAQ6AEwBQ#v=onepage&q=rolling%20stone%20ani%20difranco%20album%20guide&f=false}}</ref> |rev3 = ''[[Slant Magazine|Slant]]'' |rev3score = {{Rating|3.5|5}}<ref>[http://www.slantmagazine.com/music/review/ani-difranco-ani-difranco Slant review]</ref> }}<!-- Automatically generated by DASHBot--> '''''Ani DiFranco''''' is the eponymous debut album by [[singer-songwriter]] [[Ani DiFranco]], released in 1990 (see [[1990 in music]]). == Track listing == All songs by Ani DiFranco. # "Both Hands" – 3:38 # "Talk to Me Now" – 4:29 # "The Slant" – 1:36 # "Work Your Way Out" – 4:08 # "Dog Coffee" – 2:56 # "Lost Woman Song" – 4:50 # "Pale Purple" – 4:02 # "Rush Hour" – 5:03 # "Fire Door" – 2:42 # "The Story" – 3:30 # "Every Angle" – 2:44 # "Out of Habit" – 2:45 # "Letting the Telephone Ring" – 4:30 == Personnel == * Ani DiFranco – [[guitar]], [[vocals]] == Production == * [[record producer|Producers]] – Ani DiFranco, Dale Anderson * [[audio engineer|Engineer]] – John Caruso * [[audio mastering|Mastering]] – Ed Stone * [[Photography]] – Scot Fisher * [[album art|Artwork]] – Dave Meinzer ==References== {{Reflist}} {{Ani DiFranco}} {{DEFAULTSORT:Ani Difranco (Album)}} [[Category:1990 debut albums]] [[Category:Righteous Babe Records albums]] [[Category:Ani DiFranco albums]]
